H3.text: what did the ancient romans speak. Latin Language

A4.text: Latin was originally spoken by the Latins in Latium (now known as Lazio), the lower Tiber area around Rome, Italy.

A5.text: Through the expansion of the Roman Republic, it became the dominant language in the Italian Peninsula and subsequently throughout the Roman Empire.
